modules.title: Introduction to Data Structures
modules.description: Understand the importance of data structures, their classifications, and how they enhance problem-solving.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Time & Space Complexity
modules.description: Learn how to analyze the efficiency of algorithms using Big-O notation.
topicsCovered: Common Complexities (O(1), O(log N), O(N), O(N log N), O(N²))
Best, Worst, and Average Case Analysis
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Strings & String Manipulation
modules.description: Learn how strings are managed in Java and their importance in problem-solving.
topicsCovered: Common String Operations (Reverse, Substring, Concatenation, etc.)
Trie Data Structure for String Processing
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Arrays in Java
modules.description: Learn about arrays, their operations, and use cases in Java.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Linked List
modules.description: Learn about linked lists, types, and operations in Java.
topicsCovered: Operations: Insert, Delete, Reverse, Detect Cycle
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Stack
modules.description: Learn about stack data structure and its applications.
topicsCovered: Stack Implementation using Arrays & Linked List
Stack Using Java Collections (Stack Class, Deque)
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Queue
modules.description: Learn about queues and their variations in Java.
topicsCovered: Queue Using Java Collections (Queue Interface, Deque)
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Hashing & Hash Tables
modules.description: Learn about hashing and hash table implementation in Java.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Trees
modules.description: Understand tree data structures and their applications.
topicsCovered: Heap Data Structure (Min Heap, Max Heap)
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Graph Data Structure
modules.description: Learn graph concepts and graph traversal techniques.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Heap & Priority Queue
modules.description: Understand heap properties and priority queues.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Advanced Data Structures
modules.description: Explore advanced data structures used in high-performance applications.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Interview Preparation: Common Data Structure Problems
modules.description: Prepare for coding interviews with commonly asked data structure problems.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Capstone Project: Implementing Data Structures
modules.description: Work on a real-world project that uses multiple data structures.
modules.author: CSExplore Team
